name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
Week 1 Orientation and assign textbook
Week 2 Holiday (Feb 28)
Week 3 Structure and Outline of Essay / Thesis Statement
	Style: Finding the Action
Week 4 Introductions and Conclusions
	Style: Focusing the Action / Staging the Characters
Week 5 Body Paragraphs / Unity and Coherence / Sublist 6 Quiz
Week 6 Information Principle / Understanding Style / Correctness
Week 7 Holiday (April 4)
Week 8 Process Essays / Sublist 7 Quiz
Week 9 Comparison and Contrast Essays / Style: Characters
Week 10 Classification Essays / Style: Cohesion and Coherence
Week 11 Cause and Effect Essays / Sublist 8 Quiz
Week 12 Problem and Solution Essays / Style: Concision 
Week 13 Persuasion Essays / Style: Shape 
Week 14 Summarizing / Style: Elegance / Sublist 9 Quiz
Week 15 Paraphrasing / Style: Clarity of Form: Coherence
Week 16 Holiday: Dragon Boat Festival
Week 17 The Ethics of Style / Sublist 10 Quiz
Week 18 Term Paper Due
scorePolicy:
Vocabulary Quiz 15%
Exercises 15%
Writing Homework (and Revisions) 40%
Term Paper 30%
materials: Williams, Joseph M. 2007. Style: Lessons in Clarity and Grace. Ninth Edition. Pearson Longman (available at Bookman).
